Hey there - I've been monitoring our support situation and wanted to give you a heads up on what I'm seeing.

**The Good:** We're hitting 86% SLA compliance and maintaining a 4.2 CSAT, so our team is performing well operationally.

**The Concerning:** I'm seeing patterns in our tickets that directly connect to the growth stall you've been wrestling with:

🚨 **Shipping Issues Are Accelerating**
• 79 tickets mentioning shipping delays (up 39% this period)
• 44% of these are negative sentiment 
• Common phrases: "still waiting for 2 weeks", "very frustrated about shipping"

📉 **Customer Retention Signals Flashing Red**
• 9 cancellation requests in urgent queue
• 24 at-risk customers flagged in recent tickets
• 11 tickets asking competitor comparisons
• Sample: "How does your service compare to [competitor]?"

🎯 **Quality Complaints Trending Up 29%**
• 30 tickets about product quality issues
• Multiple customers saying "third box in a row with issues"
• This is feeding directly into our churn problem

**My Recommendation:** These aren't just support issues - they're growth blockers. The shipping and quality problems are creating a perfect storm that's stalling acquisition (word of mouth damage) and accelerating churn.

Want me to pull specific customer quotes about the competitor mentions? I'm seeing some clear patterns about their loyalty program that might help inform our response strategy.

How do you want to tackle this? I can prioritize reaching out to the at-risk VIPs while you address the operational issues.
